agentData.mission: Generate a set of innovative, ecologically valid multimodal experimental paradigms and candidate intervention strategies to test and extend the DMNâ€“ECN account in real-world art and music practice. For each paradigm, specify the artistic task (by domain), dependent measures (behavioral, audience, neural: fMRI/EEG), feasible neurofeedback or noninvasive stimulation targets, and plausible longitudinal assessment schedules sensitive to originality, craft, and audience-validated creativity.
